text: وما هو بقول شاعر قليلا ما تؤمنون

translations.translation: And not the word of a poet. How little is it that you believe!
not the speech of a poet. Little do you believe!
It is not the word of a poet but only a few of you have faith,
And it is not the speech of a poet; how little do you believe!
It is not the word of a poet, little is that you believe!
And it is not the word of a poet; little is it that you believe;
It is not the speech of a poet (little do you believe)
It is not poet's speech - little is it that ye believe!
it is not the word of a poet -- how little you believe! --
And it is not the speech of a poet. Little it is that ye believe
and it is not the speech of a poet. Little is the faith that you have!
It is not the word of a poet: little it is ye believe!
It is not the word of a poet, little is that you believe!
It is not the speech of a poet little do you believe
And it is not the speech of a poet—little do you believe.
And it is not the word of a poet; little do you believe.
[69:41] And it is not the speech of a poet. Little do you believe!
(It) i.e. the Qur'an (is not poet's speech) that a poet composes (little is it that ye believe!) He says: you do not believe in little or much.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَمَا هُوَ } أي: القرآن { بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍ } كما يقوله في حقه بعض الكفرة الجاهلين بقدره وشأنه، لكن { قَلِيلاً مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ } [الحاقة: 41] بصدقه وحقيته؛ لفرط عنادكم واستنكاركم
